resources.string: 1- Do you have any lump in the breast or underarm(armpit) ?
2- Do you have thickening or swelling of part of the breast ?
3- Are you suferring from irritation or dimpling of breast skin ?
4- Do you have redness or flaky skin in the nipple area or the breast ?
5- Are you suffering from redness or flaky skin in the nipple area or the breast ?
6- Do you have nipple discharge other than breast milk, including blood ?
7- Do you have any change in the size or shape of the breast ?
8- Are you suffering in the pain area of the breast ?
